response.original_title: Wenn nicht nur die Sonne lacht
response.overview: Mr. Bang is totally nervous. His doctor cannot help him either and recommends that he should go on vacation. Nothing easier than that. But the calm does not really want to come back. From struggling with a deck chair to encountering an octopus that is out for a picnic, he is spared nothing.
response.title: When It's Not Just The Sun That Shines

results.name: Wenn nicht nur die Sonne lacht - Sommerausflug (2006) [Zeichentrick] | ganzer Film (deutsch)
